events.message: I just received my order and the product is clearly damaged. There is a big scratch on the surface and it doesn't look new at all.
The reported issue has been categorized under product defect due to the customer's description of scratches and damage.
A customer support agent specialized in defects has been assigned to handle the case regarding the damaged product.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I’d like to help resolve this for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and damage on the item, as well as your order number so I can review your purchase?
Here are the photos of the damaged product as requested, along with my order number 456789. Please let me know how we can fix this issue.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement sent out immediately or a full refund if you prefer. Please advise which option you’d like to proceed with.
I appreciate the quick response. I would like to receive the replacement as soon as possible since I need the product urgently.
We have processed your replacement order and you should receive a shipping confirmation shortly. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement product arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it’s perfect. Thanks so much for handling this quickly and professionally.
We’re glad to hear the replacement meets your expectations. Closing the case now and feel free to reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service moving forward.
